DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess rate extent absorption JNJ63623872 follow administration single oral dose 2*300 milligram ( mg ) give 2 concept single agent tablet formulation compare administration 2*300 mg JNJ63623872 reference tablet , fast condition healthy adult participant assess rate extent absorption JNJ63623872 oseltamivir follow administration single oral dose 2*300 mg/37.5 mg JNJ63623872/ oseltamivir give concept fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet formulation compare coadministration 2*300 mg JNJ63623872 tablet ( reference formulation ) 1*75 mg oseltamivir capsule , fast condition healthy adult participant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Relative Oral Bioavailability Single Dose JNJ-63623872/Oseltamivir Fixed-dose Combination Tablet Single Agent Concept Formulations JNJ-63623872 Compared Their Respective Reference Formulation Healthy Adult Participants
